motd: Removed: No longer has a 0.01-second internal delay between applying stacks.

passive_1: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack inflicts 6% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 25% at 6 stacks.
motd: Change: Fervor can now trigger on mitigated damage.

passive_2: Dealing physical damage grants you 20 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

passive_1: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 4% armor reduction, up to 24% at 6 stacks.
passive_2: Basic attacks on-hit grant [20|10] bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

motd: Bugfix: Bug Fix: Titanic Hydra's Cleave and certain other on-hit effects from items and Champion passives no longer apply an additional stack of Carve on basic attacks if Black Cleaver's effect was acquired later (in a higher buff slot) than the on-hit effect.

passive_2: Dealing physical damage to a champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of *Carve* on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.

passive_1: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion reduces their armor by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times for a maximum of 24%.
Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion reduces their armor by 4% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times for a maximum of 24%.
passive_2: Dealing physical damage to a champion grants 5 bonus movement speed per stack of *Carve* on them for 2 seconds, up to 30.

passive_1: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion reduces their armor by 4% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times for a maximum of 24%. Enemies with 6 stacks are *Shredded*.
passive_2: Basic attacks (on-hit) and damaging abilities against fully *Shredded* enemies deal bonus physical damage equal to 5% of their missing health, reduced to 2% of their missing health for damage over time effects (0.5 second cooldown).

motd: Undocumented: An ability cannot add more than one stack in an instant.

passive_1: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion *Cleaves* them, reducing their armor by 4% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.

motd: Bugfix: Fixed a bug where an enemy hit with multiple shells from Graves' basic attacks only applied a single stack of The Black Cleaver.

passive_1: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion *Cleaves* them, reducing their armor by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.
passive_2: Dealing physical damage grants [20|10] movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant [60|30] movement speed for 2 seconds instead.

motd: Change: Can no longer apply more than one stack of Armor Shred in a single basic attack.

passive_1: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion reduces their armor by 5% for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion reduces their armor by 6.25% for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion reduces their armor by 7.5% for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

motd: Change: No longer shreds Dragon and Baron Nashor's armor.

passive_1: Physical attacks reduce your target's Armor by 15 for 5 seconds, (maximum 3 stacks).
Physical attacks reduce your target's Armor by 12 for 5 seconds, (maximum 5 stacks).
